question: Which of the following is not a part of CIA Triad?
On which toll free number a complaint can be registered with Punjab Police Cyber Crime Division in case of any online fraud?
Which Act in India focuses on Cyber Crime?
Any offense committed against a person or groups of people using digital gadget is known as __________.
__________ refers to the code of responsible behavior on the internet.
__________ is an act of secretly or stealthily listening to the private conversation or communications of others without their consent.
CIA triad stands for __________, Integrity, and Availability.
CIA triad stands for Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability.

Cyber Ethics ensure that users understand their responsibilities for conducting themselves online.
Hacking is used to expose vulnerabilities in systems too.
Spying is an act of keeping a secret watch on various activities of opponents for intelligence purposes.
